q1.content: Tell me about anything big that has happened in the past two years related to your health: any medical diagnoses, flare-ups of chronic conditions, broken bones, pain – anything like that.
q1.requirement: Inquire about significant health events in the interviewee's recent past. Encourage a detailed account of the events leading up to a significant health incident. Your objective is accomplished if the participant says there is nothing wrong with their health.
